channel.title: Mike Taber - Single Founder Handbook
channel.description:
I've enjoyed some of Mike writing over on www.singlefounder.com and think a lot of it resonates with the bootstrapped crowd I think.
He's on the well trodden path to e-book authorship and this could be worth a read :-
http://www.singlefounder.com/2014/12/17/announcing-the-single-founder-handbook/

item.title: Mike Taber - Single Founder Handbook
item.dc:creator: SingleFounder
item.description:
Hi everyone. The direct link to the signup page is here:
http://www.singlefounderhandbook.com

If you sign up, you’ll get an email with a few questions and I’d really appreciate any replies to that email. I’m tracking all of them so that I can tailor the book to what people are really looking for.

Hope to hear from you soon.

Read full topic
